snippet: Three jury members were dismissed Tuesday from the murder trial of the gunman who opened fire inside an Aurora, Colo.
abstract: Three jury members in murder trial of James E Holmes for shooting in Aurora, Colo, movie theater are dismissed over concerns that they heard or discussed news reports about the case while on breaks from the trial.
lead_paragraph: Three jury members were dismissed Tuesday from the murder trial of the gunman who opened fire inside an Aurora, Colo.

headline.main: Colorado: 3 Are Removed From Theater Murder Jury
headline.print_headline: Colorado: 3 Are Removed From Theater Murder Jury
